entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 08:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
